basic.headline: Chair, Gates Foundation and Founder, Breakthrough Energy

profiles.about: Chair of the Gates Foundation. Founder of Breakthrough Energy. Co-founder of Microsoft. Voracious reader. Avid traveler. Active blogger.Chair of the Gates Foundation. Founder of Breakthrough Energy. Co-founder of Microsoft. Voracious reader. Avid traveler. Active blogger.

As chairman and CEO of Microsoft, I define my mission and that of my company as empowering every person and every organization on the planet to achieve more.As chairman and CEO of Microsoft, I define my mission and that of my company as empowering every person and every organization on the planet to achieve more.

education.institute: The University of Chicago Booth School of Business

basic.headline: Aspiring Data Analyst | Passionate about Data Science and Cybersecurity

profiles.about:
I am a Computer Science Engineer, Data Analyst, and AI Engineer with a strong passion for building intelligent, data-driven solutions that solve real-world business problems.My journey into computer science began with a natural curiosity about how computers work beyond the screen — a curiosity that has evolved into hands-on experience with AI systems, data analytics, and automation. Currently, I work as a Data Analyst at Anaxee Digital Runners, where I design end-to-end analytics solutions, build LLM-powered RAG systems, create interactive geospatial dashboards, and automate insight generation for large-scale GTM and climate projects.I have practical experience working with Python, SQL, Machine Learning, Computer Vision, LLMs, and cloud platforms, and I actively build AI-driven tools that reduce manual effort and improve decision-making speed. My work spans data modeling, AI workflows, retrieval-augmented generation, dashboards, and real-time analytics.Beyond academics and work, I have actively taken leadership and collaborative roles — serving as Photography Head of AMOGH Photography Club, managing a 75+ member team, and collaborating with brands like Nikon, DJI, and Insta360 during major university events. I’ve also been part of the Google Developer Student Club, participated in national-level hackathons, and consistently engaged in technical and creative communities.I am deeply enthusiastic about AI engineering, data science, and software development, and I am always looking to upgrade my skills and contribute to impactful, innovation-driven projects at the intersection of AI, data, and business.I am a Computer Science Engineer, Data Analyst, and AI Engineer with a strong passion for building intelligent, data-driven solutions that solve real-world business problems.

My journey into computer science began with a natural curiosity about how computers work beyond the screen — a curiosity that has evolved into hands-on experience with AI systems, data analytics, and automation. Currently, I work as a Data Analyst at Anaxee Digital Runners, where I design end-to-end analytics solutions, build LLM-powered RAG systems, create interactive geospatial dashboards, and automate insight generation for large-scale GTM and climate projects.

I have practical experience working with Python, SQL, Machine Learning, Computer Vision, LLMs, and cloud platforms, and I actively build AI-driven tools that reduce manual effort and improve decision-making speed. My work spans data modeling, AI workflows, retrieval-augmented generation, dashboards, and real-time analytics.

Beyond academics and work, I have actively taken leadership and collaborative roles — serving as Photography Head of AMOGH Photography Club, managing a 75+ member team, and collaborating with brands like Nikon, DJI, and Insta360 during major university events. I’ve also been part of the Google Developer Student Club, participated in national-level hackathons, and consistently engaged in technical and creative communities.

I am deeply enthusiastic about AI engineering, data science, and software development, and I am always looking to upgrade my skills and contribute to impactful, innovation-driven projects at the intersection of AI, data, and business.

experience.description: Data Analyst Full-time Jul 2024 - Present · 1 yr 8 mos Data Analyst Intern Internship Feb 2024 - Jun 2024 · 5 mos Aspiring Data Analyst | Currently honing my skills as a Data Analyst Intern, eagerly delving into real-world data challenges and collaborating with industry professionals. Passionate about leveraging data to drive informed decisions and create meaningful impact. Excited to learn, grow, and contribute to the world of analytics.
